TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsResourceDictionary extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

summary.span: 表示可在 中跨页使用的 元素的字典。

span.span: Represents a dictionary of elements that are usable across pages of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类具有没有公共构造函数。This class has no public constructor. 获取对引用使用方法。Get a reference to an by using the method. 有关详细信息`ResourceDictionary`元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的第 7 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `ResourceDictionary` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 7 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
